problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the parallelogram ABCD, point E is a point on the extended line of CD, BE and AD intersect at point F, if CD = 2 DE, and the area of ​​△DEF is N_0, then the area of ​​triangle ABF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴AB=CD,AB∥CD,∴△ABF∽△DEF,∴\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABF}}=(\frac{DE}{AB})²,∵CD=2DE,△DEF的面积为3,∴三角形ABF的面积为12,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了平行四边形的性质,相似三角形的性质和判定的应用,能求出\frac{S_{\bigtriangleupDEF}}{S_{\bigtriangleupABF}}=(\frac{DE}{AB})²是解此题的关键,注意:相似三角形的面积之比等于相似比的平方．
